title: Information Extraction with Character-level Neural Networks and Free Noisy Supervision

questions.question: by how much did the system improve?
evidence: In a production setting, the neural architecture presented here reduced the number of false positive extractions in financial information extraction application by INLINEFORM0 relative to a mature system developed over the course of several years.
highlighted_evidence: In a production setting, the neural architecture presented here reduced the number of false positive extractions in financial information extraction application by INLINEFORM0 relative to a mature system developed over the course of several years.

questions.question: by how much did the system improve?
questions.free_form_answer: false positives improved by 90% and recall improved by 1%
evidence: The full pipeline, deployed in a production setting, resulted in a reduction in false positives of more than INLINEFORM0 in the extractions produced by our pipeline. The drop in recall relative to the production system was smaller than INLINEFORM1 .
highlighted_evidence: The full pipeline, deployed in a production setting, resulted in a reduction in false positives of more than INLINEFORM0 in the extractions produced by our pipeline. The drop in recall relative to the production system was smaller than INLINEFORM1 .
